code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axiosClient from"./api/axiosClient";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RevenueReport(){const[startDate,setStartDate]=useState(new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]);const[endDate,setEndDate]=useState(new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]);const[revenue,setRevenue]=useState(0);const fetchRevenue=()=>{axiosClient.get("/api/revenue",{params:{start_date:startDate,end_date:endDate}}).then(res=>setRevenue(res.data.total));};useEffect(fetchRevenue,[startDate,endDate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"revenue-report",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"B\xE1o c\xE1o Doanh thu"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filters",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"T\u1EEB ng\xE0y:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:startDate,onChange:e=>setStartDate(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"\u0110\u1EBFn ng\xE0y:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:endDate,onChange:e=>setEndDate(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchRevenue,children:"T\u1EA3i l\u1EA1i"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"result",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["T\u1ED5ng doanh thu: ",revenue.toLocaleString()," VND"]})})]});}export default RevenueReport;
